summary: Mod by JPro6, only making it aviable to use with NMM
descriptionHtml:
All credits belong to JPro6, this is the .esp with all the companions.
Link to the original mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1782

The mod includes the dogs Vigilance and Meeko

NOTE: The quest \\\"Boethiah\\\'s calling\\\" will not work if this mod is enabled and your follower is essential. Please deactivate this mod to play that quest.
author: JPro6
